opc:Constant.Name: Bad_UnexpectedError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An unexpected error occurred.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InternalError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An internal error occurred as a result of a programming or configuration error.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OutOfMemory
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Not enough memory to complete the operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ResourceUnavailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An operating system resource is not available.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CommunicationError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A low level communication error occurred.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EncodingError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Encoding halted because of invalid data in the objects being serialized.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DecodingError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Decoding halted because of invalid data in the stream.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EncodingLimitsExceeded
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The message encoding/decoding limits imposed by the stack have been exceeded.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestTooLarge
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request message size exceeds limits set by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ResponseTooLarge
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The response message size exceeds limits set by the client or server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_UnknownResponse
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An unrecognized response was received from the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Timeout
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation timed out.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServiceUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support the requested service.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Shutdown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation was cancelled because the application is shutting down.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerNotConnected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation could not complete because the client is not connected to the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerHalted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has stopped and cannot process any requests.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NothingToDo
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No processing could be done because there was nothing to do.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManyOperations
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request could not be processed because it specified too many operations.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManyMonitoredItems
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request could not be processed because there are too many monitored items in the subscription.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataTypeIdUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The extension object cannot be (de)serialized because the data type id is not recognized.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate provided as a parameter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecurityChecksFailed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An error occurred verifying security.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificatePolicyCheckFailed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate does not meet the requirements of the security policy.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateTimeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate has expired or is not yet valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateIssuerTimeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An issuer certificate has expired or is not yet valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateHostNameInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The HostName used to connect to a server does not match a HostName in the certificate.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateUriInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The URI specified in the ApplicationDescription does not match the URI in the certificate.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateUseNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate may not be used for the requested operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateIssuerUseNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The issuer certificate may not be used for the requested operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateUntrusted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate is not trusted.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateRevocationUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It was not possible to determine if the certificate has been revoked.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateIssuerRevocationUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It was not possible to determine if the issuer certificate has been revoked.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateRevoked
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate has been revoked.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateIssuerRevoked
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The issuer certificate has been revoked.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_CertificateChainIncomplete
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The certificate chain is incomplete.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_UserAccessDenied
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: User does not have permission to perform the requested operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IdentityTokenInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The user identity token is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IdentityTokenRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The user identity token is valid but the server has rejected it.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecureChannelIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The specified secure channel is no longer valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InvalidTimestamp
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The timestamp is outside the range allowed by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NonceInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The nonce does appear to be not a random value or it is not the correct length.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SessionIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The session id is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SessionClosed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The session was closed by the client.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SessionNotActivated
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The session cannot be used because ActivateSession has not been called.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SubscriptionIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The subscription id is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestHeaderInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The header for the request is missing or invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TimestampsToReturnInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The timestamps to return parameter is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestCancelledByClient
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request was cancelled by the client.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManyArguments
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Too many arguments were provided.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_LicenseExpired
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server requires a license to operate in general or to perform a service or operation, but existing license is expired.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_LicenseLimitsExceeded
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has limits on number of allowed operations / objects, based on installed licenses, and these limits where exceeded.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_LicenseNotAvailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not have a license which is required to operate in general or to perform a service or operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerTooBusy
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The Server does not have the resources to process the request at this time.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_PasswordChangeRequired
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The log-on for the user succeeded but the user is required to change the password.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_SubscriptionTransferred
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The subscription was transferred to another session.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CompletesAsynchronously
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The processing will complete asynchronously.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Overload
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Sampling has slowed down due to resource limitations.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Clamped
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value written was accepted but was clamped.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoCommunication
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Communication with the data source is defined, but not established, and there is no last known value available.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_WaitingForInitialData
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Waiting for the server to obtain values from the underlying data source.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The syntax the node id is not valid or refers to a node that is not valid for the operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeIdUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The node id refers to a node that does not exist in the server address space.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AttributeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The attribute is not supported for the specified Node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IndexRangeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The syntax of the index range parameter is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IndexRangeNoData
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No data exists within the range of indexes specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IndexRangeDataMismatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The written data does not match the IndexRange specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataEncodingInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data encoding is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataEncodingUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support the requested data encoding for the node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotReadable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The access level does not allow reading or subscribing to the Node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotWritable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The access level does not allow writing to the Node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OutOfRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value was out of range.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_OverRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is over the allowed range.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_UnderRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is under the allowed range.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation is not supported.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotFound
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A requested item was not found or a search operation ended without success.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ObjectDeleted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The object cannot be used because it has been deleted.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotImplemented
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Requested operation is not implemented.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MonitoringModeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The monitoring mode is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MonitoredItemIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The monitoring item id does not refer to a valid monitored item.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MonitoredItemFilterInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The monitored item filter parameter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MonitoredItemFilterUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support the requested monitored item filter.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A monitoring filter cannot be used in combination with the attribute specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_StructureMissing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A mandatory structured parameter was missing or null.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EventFilterInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The event filter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ContentFilterInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The content filter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterOperatorInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An unrecognized operator was provided in a filter.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterOperatorUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A valid operator was provided, but the server does not provide support for this filter operator.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterOperandCountMismatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The number of operands provided for the filter operator was less then expected for the operand provided.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterOperandInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operand used in a content filter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterElementInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The referenced element is not a valid element in the content filter.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_FilterLiteralInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The referenced literal is not a valid value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ContinuationPointInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The continuation point provide is longer valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoContinuationPoints
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation could not be processed because all continuation points have been allocated.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ReferenceTypeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The reference type id does not refer to a valid reference type node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_BrowseDirectionInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The browse direction is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeNotInView
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The node is not part of the view.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NumericOverflow
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The number was not accepted because of a numeric overflow.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_LocaleNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The locale in the requested write operation is not supported.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The variable has no default value and no initial value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerUriInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The ServerUri is not a valid URI.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerNameMissing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No ServerName was specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DiscoveryUrlMissing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No DiscoveryUrl was specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SemaphoreFileMissing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The semaphore file specified by the client is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestTypeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The security token request type is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecurityModeRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The security mode does not meet the requirements set by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecurityPolicyRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The security policy does not meet the requirements set by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManySessions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has reached its maximum number of sessions.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_UserSignatureInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The user token signature is missing or invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ApplicationSignatureInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The signature generated with the client certificate is missing or invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoValidCertificates
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The client did not provide at least one software certificate that is valid and meets the profile requirements for the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_IdentityChangeNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support changing the user identity assigned to the session.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestCancelledByRequest
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request was cancelled by the client with the Cancel service.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ParentNodeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The parent node id does not to refer to a valid node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ReferenceNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The reference could not be created because it violates constraints imposed by the data model.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeIdRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested node id was reject because it was either invalid or server does not allow node ids to be specified by the client.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeIdExists
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested node id is already used by another node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeClassInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The node class is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_BrowseNameInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The browse name is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_BrowseNameDuplicated
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The browse name is not unique among nodes that share the same relationship with the parent.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NodeAttributesInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The node attributes are not valid for the node class.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TypeDefinitionInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The type definition node id does not reference an appropriate type node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SourceNodeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The source node id does not reference a valid node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TargetNodeIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The target node id does not reference a valid node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DuplicateReferenceNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The reference type between the nodes is already defined.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InvalidSelfReference
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not allow this type of self reference on this node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ReferenceLocalOnly
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The reference type is not valid for a reference to a remote server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoDeleteRights
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server will not allow the node to be deleted.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_ReferenceNotDeleted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server was not able to delete all target references.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ServerIndexInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server index is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ViewIdUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The view id does not refer to a valid view node.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ViewTimestampInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The view timestamp is not available or not supported.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ViewParameterMismatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The view parameters are not consistent with each other.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ViewVersionInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The view version is not available or not supported.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_NotAllNodesAvailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The list of references may not be complete because the underlying system is not available.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_ResultsMayBeIncomplete
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server should have followed a reference to a node in a remote server but did not. The result set may be incomplete.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotTypeDefinition
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The provided Nodeid was not a type definition nodeid.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_ReferenceOutOfServer
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: One of the references to follow in the relative path references to a node in the address space in another server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManyMatches
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation has too many matches to return.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_QueryTooComplex
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation requires too many resources in the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoMatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation has no match to return.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MaxAgeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The max age parameter is invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecurityModeInsufficient
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation is not permitted over the current secure channel.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_HistoryOperationInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The history details parameter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_HistoryOperationUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support the requested operation.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InvalidTimestampArgument
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The defined timestamp to return was invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_WriteNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not support writing the combination of value, status and timestamps provided.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TypeMismatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value supplied for the attribute is not of the same type as the attribute's value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MethodInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The method id does not refer to a method for the specified object.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ArgumentsMissing
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The client did not specify all of the input arguments for the method.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotExecutable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The executable attribute does not allow the execution of the method.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManySubscriptions
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has reached its maximum number of subscriptions.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TooManyPublishRequests
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has reached the maximum number of queued publish requests.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoSubscription
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There is no subscription available for this session.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SequenceNumberUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The sequence number is unknown to the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_RetransmissionQueueNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The Server does not support retransmission queue and acknowledgement of sequence numbers is not available.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MessageNotAvailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested notification message is no longer available.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InsufficientClientProfile
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The client of the current session does not support one or more Profiles that are necessary for the subscription.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_StateNotActive
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The sub-state machine is not currently active.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AlreadyExists
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An equivalent rule already exists.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpServerTooBusy
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server cannot process the request because it is too busy.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpMessageTypeInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The type of the message specified in the header invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpSecureChannelUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The SecureChannelId and/or TokenId are not currently in use.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpMessageTooLarge
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The size of the message chunk specified in the header is too large.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpNotEnoughResources
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There are not enough resources to process the request.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpInternalError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: An internal error occurred.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TcpEndpointUrlInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server does not recognize the QueryString specified.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestInterrupted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request could not be sent because of a network interruption.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestTimeout
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Timeout occurred while processing the request.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecureChannelClosed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The secure channel has been closed.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SecureChannelTokenUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The token has expired or is not recognized.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SequenceNumberInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The sequence number is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ProtocolVersionUnsupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The applications do not have compatible protocol versions.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConfigurationError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There is a problem with the configuration that affects the usefulness of the value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NotConnected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The variable should receive its value from another variable, but has never been configured to do so.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DeviceFailure
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There has been a failure in the device/data source that generates the value that has affected the value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SensorFailure
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There has been a failure in the sensor from which the value is derived by the device/data source.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OutOfService
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The source of the data is not operational.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DeadbandFilterInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The deadband filter is not valid.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_NoCommunicationLastUsableValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Communication to the data source has failed. The variable value is the last value that had a good quality.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_LastUsableValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Whatever was updating this value has stopped doing so.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_SubstituteValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is an operational value that was manually overwritten.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_InitialValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is an initial value for a variable that normally receives its value from another variable.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_SensorNotAccurate
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is at one of the sensor limits.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_EngineeringUnitsExceeded
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is outside of the range of values defined for this parameter.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_SubNormal
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data value is derived from multiple sources and has less than the required number of Good sources.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_LocalOverride
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value has been overridden.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_SubNormal
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is derived from multiple sources and has the required number of Good sources, but less than the full number of Good sources.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RefreshInProgress
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: This Condition refresh failed, a Condition refresh operation is already in progress.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionAlreadyDisabled
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: This condition has already been disabled.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionAlreadyEnabled
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: This condition has already been enabled.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionDisabled
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Property not available, this condition is disabled.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EventIdUnknown
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The specified event id is not recognized.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EventNotAcknowledgeable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The event cannot be acknowledged.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DialogNotActive
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The dialog condition is not active.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DialogResponseInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The response is not valid for the dialog.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionBranchAlreadyAcked
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The condition branch has already been acknowledged.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionBranchAlreadyConfirmed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The condition branch has already been confirmed.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionAlreadyShelved
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The condition has already been shelved.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConditionNotShelved
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The condition is not currently shelved.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ShelvingTimeOutOfRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The shelving time not within an acceptable range.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoData
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No data exists for the requested time range or event filter.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_BoundNotFound
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No data found to provide upper or lower bound value.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_BoundNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server cannot retrieve a bound for the variable.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataLost
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Data is missing due to collection started/stopped/lost.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataUnavailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Expected data is unavailable for the requested time range due to an un-mounted volume, an off-line archive or tape, or similar reason for temporary unavailability.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EntryExists
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data or event was not successfully inserted because a matching entry exists.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoEntryExists
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data or event was not successfully updated because no matching entry exists.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TimestampNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The Client requested history using a TimestampsToReturn the Server does not support.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_EntryInserted
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data or event was successfully inserted into the historical database.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_EntryReplaced
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The data or event field was successfully replaced in the historical database.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_DataSubNormal
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The aggregate value is derived from multiple values and has less than the required number of Good values.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_NoData
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No data exists for the requested time range or event filter.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_MoreData
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: More data is available in the time range beyond the number of values requested.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AggregateListMismatch
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested number of Aggregates does not match the requested number of NodeIds.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AggregateNotSupported
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested Aggregate is not support by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AggregateInvalidInputs
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The aggregate value could not be derived due to invalid data inputs.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_AggregateConfigurationRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The aggregate configuration is not valid for specified node.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_DataIgnored
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request specifies fields which are not valid for the EventType or cannot be saved by the historian.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestNotAllowed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request was rejected by the server because it did not meet the criteria set by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequestNotComplete
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The request has not been processed by the server yet.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TransactionPending
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation is not allowed because a transaction is in progress.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TransactionFailed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation failed and all changes which were part of the transaction are rolled back.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TicketRequired
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The device identity needs a ticket before it can be accepted.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_TicketInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The device identity needs a ticket before it can be accepted.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Locked
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation is not allowed, because the Node is locked by a different application.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_RequiresLock
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The requested operation is not allowed, because the Node is not locked by the application.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Edited
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value does not come from the real source and has been edited by the server.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_PostActionFailed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There was an error in execution of these post-actions.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_DominantValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The related EngineeringUnit has been changed but the Variable Value is still provided based on the previous unit.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DominantValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The related EngineeringUnit has been changed but this change has not been applied to the device. The Variable Value is still dependent on the previous unit but its status is currently Bad.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device. The quality of the dominant variable is uncertain.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A dependent value has been changed but the change has not been applied to the device. The quality of the dominant variable is Bad.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Edited_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dominant Variable value when a dependent Variable has changed but the change has not been applied.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Edited_DominantValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed but the change has not been applied.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Edited_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed but change has not been applied.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Edited_OutOfRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a Variable value when Variable has changed but the value is not legal.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InitialValue_OutOfRange
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a Variable value when a source Variable has changed but the value is not legal.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed and the value is not legal.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Edited_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant Variable has changed, the value is not legal and the change has not been applied.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed and the value is not legal.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Edited_OutOfRange_DominantValueChanged_DependentValueChanged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: It is delivered with a dependent Variable value when a dominant or dependent Variable has changed, the value is not legal and the change has not been applied.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CommunicationEvent
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The communication layer has raised an event.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_ShutdownEvent
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The system is shutting down.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CallAgain
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation is not finished and needs to be called again.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_NonCriticalTimeout
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A non-critical timeout occurred.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InvalidArgument
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: One or more arguments are invalid.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConnectionRejected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Could not establish a network connection to remote server.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_Disconnect
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The server has disconnected from the client.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ConnectionClosed
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The network connection has been closed.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_InvalidState
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation cannot be completed because the object is closed, uninitialized or in some other invalid state.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_EndOfStream
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Cannot move beyond end of the stream.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_NoDataAvailable
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: No data is currently available for reading from a non-blocking stream.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_WaitingForResponse
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The asynchronous operation is waiting for a response.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_OperationAbandoned
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The asynchronous operation was abandoned by the caller.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_ExpectedStreamToBlock
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The stream did not return all data requested (possibly because it is a non-blocking stream).

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_WouldBlock
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: Non blocking behaviour is required and the operation would block.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_SyntaxError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A value had an invalid syntax.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_MaxConnectionsReached
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The operation could not be finished because all available connections are in use.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_TransducerInManual
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value may not be accurate because the transducer is in manual mode.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_SimulatedValue
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is simulated.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_SensorCalibration
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value may not be accurate due to a sensor calibration fault.

opc:Constant.Name: Uncertain_ConfigurationError
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value may not be accurate due to a configuration issue.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CascadeInitializationAcknowledged
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value source supports cascade handshaking and the value has been Initialized based on an initialization request from a cascade secondary.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CascadeInitializationRequest
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value source supports cascade handshaking and is requesting initialization of a cascade primary.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CascadeNotInvited
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value source supports cascade handshaking, however, the source’s current state does not allow for cascade.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_CascadeNotSelected
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value source supports cascade handshaking, however, the source has not selected the corresponding cascade primary for use.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_FaultStateActive
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: There is a fault state condition active in the value source.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_InitiateFaultState
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: A fault state condition is being requested of the destination.

opc:Constant.Name: Good_Cascade
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The value is accurate, and the signal source supports cascade handshaking.

opc:Constant.Name: Bad_DataSetIdInvalid
opc:Constant.opc:Documentation: The DataSet specified for the DataSetWriter creation is invalid.
